divs: sighting details(you tube link moved to investigator field) cms 08\30\11 09:38 cst flg this video has some adult language. it is raw, unedited footage from the event. 2 witnesses were present, which will be apparent from the audio. i would like to commend you on your wonderful changes to the reporting section to the website. i'm still waiting for you to add the "fake plane" or "holographic plane" to your sighting options. most ufologists are aware of holographic\shapeshifted planes........ west mankato is a great place to see 50-100 of these per night\given it is clear......thank you for searching for the truth mufon(or knowing it already, and keeping it tight lipped)
